parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.36

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Broken Commands

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> DLC

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns a list of all DLCs objects the unit is currently using. For example if a unit is inside a vehicle from DLC, it will return the code of that DLC.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[getPersonUsedDLCs]] unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]] of [[Number|Numbers]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_objects = [[getPersonUsedDLCs]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value>  [[getDLCs]], [[getObjectDLC]], [[getMissionDLCs]], [[getDLCAssetsUsageByName]], [[getDLCAssetsUsage]], [[getAssetDLCInfo]]

</value></part><part><name>pr</name>=<value> <template><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Warning</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>This command does not work on a dedicated server.</value></part></template>
</value></part></template></root>
